alert.note: Alert for Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rankin County through 600 PM CDT... At 525 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johns, or 13 miles southeast of Brandon. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Rankin County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
